languages.text: "Вас интересует сводка по кораблю или состояние ваших непосредственных подчиненных?"
"Are you interested in a general report on the ship as a whole or in hearing about how your immediate subordinates are faring?"
languages.original_text: "Вас интересует сводка по кораблю или состояние ваших непосредственных подчиненных?"

traits.locale_text: "Are you interested in a general report on the ship as a whole or in hearing about how your immediate subordinates are faring?"
"Are you interested in a general report on the ship as a whole or in hearing about how your immediate subordinates are faring?"
"Are you interested in a general report on the ship as a whole or in hearing about how your immediate subordinates are faring?"
"Are you interested in a general report on the ship as a whole or in hearing about how your immediate subordinates are faring?"
"Are you interested in a general report on the ship as a whole or in hearing about how your immediate subordinates are faring?"
"Are you interested in a general report on the ship as a whole or in hearing about how your immediate subordinates are faring?"
"Are you interested in a general report on the ship as a whole or in hearing about how your immediate subordinates are faring?"

languages.text: "Hättet Ihr gerne einen allgemeinen Bericht über das Schiff als Ganzes oder interessiert Ihr euch eher für das Befinden Eurer Untergebenen?"
languages.original_text: "Are you interested in a general report on the ship as a whole or in hearing about how your immediate subordinates are faring?"

traits.locale_text: "Hättet Ihr gerne einen allgemeinen Bericht über das Schiff als Ganzes oder interessiert Ihr euch eher für das Befinden Eurer Untergebenen?"

languages.text: « Vous voulez un rapport sur le vaisseau dans sa globalité ou sur la santé de vos plus proches subordonnés ? »
languages.original_text: "Are you interested in a general report on the ship as a whole or in hearing about how your immediate subordinates are faring?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez un rapport sur le vaisseau dans sa globalité ou sur la santé de vos plus proches subordonnés ? »

languages.text: «¿Desea que le presente un informe sobre el estado general de la nave, o prefiere que le diga cómo están sus subordinados directos?».
languages.original_text: "Are you interested in a general report on the ship as a whole or in hearing about how your immediate subordinates are faring?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Desea que le presente un informe sobre el estado general de la nave, o prefiere que le diga cómo están sus subordinados directos?».

languages.text: 「船全体に関する一般的な報告と、直属の部下の状況についてと、どちらをお聞きになりたいですか？」
languages.original_text: "Are you interested in a general report on the ship as a whole or in hearing about how your immediate subordinates are faring?"

traits.locale_text: 「船全体に関する一般的な報告と、直属の部下の状況についてと、どちらをお聞きになりたいですか？」

languages.text: “您是想了解整艘船的总体情况，还是想了解您直属下属的情况？”
languages.original_text: "Are you interested in a general report on the ship as a whole or in hearing about how your immediate subordinates are faring?"

traits.locale_text: “您是想了解整艘船的总体情况，还是想了解您直属下属的情况？”

languages.text: "Gemiye dair genel bir bilgilendirme mi istersiniz yoksa yakınınızda bulunan astlarınızın durumunu duymak mı?"
languages.original_text: "Are you interested in a general report on the ship as a whole or in hearing about how your immediate subordinates are faring?"
